body.name: Vanicream Liquid Cleanser - 8 fl oz – Unscented, Gluten-Free Formula for Sensitive Skin
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Gentle cleansing: This gluten-free cleanser is effective for everyday use on face, hands and body by the entire family
Mild formula: This cleanser is effective, yet gentle to sensitive skin; our formula is sulfate-free, phosphate-free and gluten-free
Free of common chemical irritants: Our products are free of dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens and formaldehyde releasers
Dermatologist tested: Vanicream products are formulated with ingredients dermatologists consider desirable and not irritating or sensitizing to the skin
Directions: Apply generous amount to wet skin; lather, rinse, and pat dry with a towel; great for daily use by the entire family; packaging may vary
body.description: Free & Clear Liquid Cleanser is a soap-free oil-free cleanser that has been formulated to avoid comment chemical irritants found in ordinary liquid cleansers. Free of dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens and formaldehyde. It is also non-comedogenic, sulfate-free, betaine-free, and gluten-free. Free & Clear Liquid Cleanser is effective yet gentle for sensitive skin. For use on face, hands, and body and all skin types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How Is This Not Getting More Attention
reviews.reviewText: Tried the gentle version of this same brand. It’s undeniably great. But for those who may be suffering from oilier skin or acne, this may be more suitable. That’s not to say this is more drying - that wouldn’t be fair and not entirely accurate. It simply leaves the skin clean without drying, without increased sensitivity without redness or any other issues. I’ve been through the Cetaphil, Ceravae and La Roche Posay families. They just never lived up to the hype. Here - less is more and in this case - much more. Great foaming action. Mild, if any, scent. No burning. No drying. No irritation. Leaves the skin in its most neutral state such that if you want to layer products on after that? You be you. But, you will not find a more solid cleanser than this. This needs a greater shout out than it currently gets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great liquid hand and bath wash
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for a long time. It has no perfume so it is great for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: When I found out they were discontinuing my go-to face soap I was so disappointed. You see, I have super sensitive skin. I have tried everything on the market. When I say everything I mean literally everything you can buy on the store shelves. After the last soap I used left me with a huge rash on both of my cheeks, I ended up at the dermatologist. While I was there she gave me a huge goody bag all kinds of soaps to try that were for sensitive skin. None of them worked except this brand. This is now my new go-to soap for my face but you can literally use it all over. In my opinion this is the best soap for sensitive skin on the market today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive/reactive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have the fairest, most sensitive skin (mix of dry and oily) and this cleanser has done wonders. This was the only one that has yet to cause me irritation/allergic reaction or a breakout in general. I use the rest of this brands products as well given their commitment to those with sensitive skin like mine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So This is What Clean Feels Like!
reviews.reviewText: Recently diagnosed with Eczema, I've been on a non-stop mission to find 'all things non-irrating' to replace all my personal and household products which aggravate my eczema. This said it's suitable for "hands, face and body", and is free of a whole bunch of common irritants and is fragrance-free so I gave it a try. I bought one for my bathroom sink and one for the kitchen sink, and will probably add it to my shower too if I can't find a suitable body wash. It makes my hands feel nice and clean: not stripped but not moisturized from extra crap, just CLEAN. I almost forgot what plain ol' clean feels like because most hand soaps have added garbage that moisturize, exfoliate, etc. This does nothing fancy, it just gives you an honest, simple clean.I washed my face with it and I always have to moisturize immediately afterward because my skin is very dry, but just for the sake of testing this product, I didn't moisturize right away. My skin didn't have that tight and itchy feeling, which was refreshing indeed. I do still need to moisturize my face, but my test showed that it's at least not harsh in any way. It has a nice lather, semi-low lathering but still enough to satisfy the senses and feels silky in the hands.My only complaint is the price. These are small bottles. There is a larger refill bottle but I still feel it's a bit on the pricey side in my opinion. I will continue to buy it, but like I said above, if I can find a less expensive eczema-friendly product for body wash I will, and reserve this for face and hands. On the plus side, a little goes a long way, I only need a very small amount for hand washing, not a full pump - maybe not even half a pump, so that helps take the some of the sting out of the price. Overall I'm very happy with this so far and I think my poor, irritated skin will thank me.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lovely foaming cleanser that is gentle
reviews.reviewText: I use it as my morning cleanser, it is effective and yet gentle. After the cleanser I will towel dry and apply my skincare soon after. If I don't, my face could feel a bit dry

reviews.reviewTitle: I absolutely LOVE this liquid cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I have systemic contact dermatitis and several severe allergies from chemical to natural ingredients . I have tried many many other products and I wish I have found this before. I can' t say enough about how gentle this cleanser is to my skin. I absolutely LOVE this liquid cleanser.
